arts.ttl: Serie A | Lazio 1-2 Fiorentina: Match Report
arts.sum: Fiorentina secured a crucial away victory against Lazio, reigniting their campaign with a 2-1 win in a fiercely contested match at the Stadio Olimpico. The Viola, donning their red away kit, struck early through Yacine Adli and Lucas Beltran to establish a commanding lead.
